fulltext:
4 Tran Phu Street, 4 Ward, District 5, HCM City 
+84 0328 383 306 
 voquocduoc@gmail.com 
 www.linkedin.com/in/vqduoc  
VO QUOC DUOC 
I’m not only having a great eye for creativity but also enthusiasm in computer programming, I have 
more than 4-year experiences in E-Commerce, web application and mobile app. Moreover, I am 
eager to learn new knowledge, I enjoy overcoming challenges with an optimistic attitude. 
EXPERIENCES  
04/2017 – PRESENT: GROOVE TECHNOLOGY 
 Position: Full Stack Javascript Developer 
 Projects: 
1. APG E-commerce site –  saba.com.au, sportscraft.com.au 
 
Maintenance, developed back-end and front-end using React js. 
2. Lalaland App - Mobile app about real estate 
 
Developed back-end and front-end using React-native, Firebase. 
Others site: 
1. SRG Site E-commerce site – rebelsport.com.au, bcf.com.au 
2. 2Xu – 2xu.com 
3. Michaelhill  – michaelhill.com.au 
4. The Warehouse – thewarehouse.co.nz 
5. French Connection - Nine West - Seed Heritage  - seedheritage.com 
Responsibilities: 
 Maintenance, developed back-end and front-end using Node js, HTML, 
JavaScript, jQuery, and Demandware Ecommerce Flatform. 
 Coded and tested new future using Object Oriented JavaScript 
09/2015 – 03/2017: BLUECOM SOLUTIONS 
 Position: Senior Developer 
 Projects: 
3. Clarins China - www.clarins.com.cn 
Demandware E-commerce site - website about cosmetic 
 
Developed back-end and front-end checkout process using HTML, JavaScript, 
jQuery, SASS, and AJAX 
 
Integrated back-end payment gateway Unionpay, Alipay, Wechatpay using 
JavaScript and RESTful Web services 
 
Developed layout account page using SASS/HTML  
 
Developed Up-Selling function using AJAX/ JavaScript 
 
Coded and tested new future using Object Oriented JavaScript 
4. Pandora Newzealand – www.estore-nz.pandora.net 
Demandware E-commerce site - website about jewellery 
 
Synchronized user information with CRM system using RESTful Web services 
 
Developed back-end and front-end custom landing page, product listing page 
using JavaScript, CSS/HTML running on Node.js 
 
Fixed bugs via Javascript and CSS 
    J     28 years old 
 
Debugged and troubleshooted JavaScript code using Node.js 
 
Integrated back-end Paypal gateway using JavaScript 
5. MCM Korea – www.kr.mcmworldwide.com 
Demandware E-commerce site -  website about the bag 
 
Integrated back-end payment Kakaopay, LG+, Usafe using JavaScript 
 
Synchronized order information with OMS system using RESTful Web services 
 
Integrated workflow transfer file to WebDAV using SFTP protocol 
 
Developed function get order history, quick view and add product to cart using 
AJAX, CSS 
 
Communicated updates in scrum meetings using JIRA software 
06/2014 – 08/2015: OPPO SCIENCE & TECHNOLOGY CO., LTD 
 Position: Software Engineer 
 Projects:  
1. Customer Service System - Web application – web about customer service 
 
Analyzed and designed database structure using MySQL 
 
Use PHP & MySQL developed report form with large data more than 30 tables 
 
Developed web service with WSDL to automatically get orders from 
warehouses into warranty warehouse using PHP and SOAP 
 
Developed Crontab to automatically update data using Linux shell script 
 
Designed interface with bootstrap v2.3.2 
 
Developed back-end users permission on system 
- 
Framework: Zend Framework 1.12 
2. Trainer System - Web application - system for trainer  
 
Developed reports of training, events, and team buildings, output excel/CSV file 
use Excel library of PHP 
 
Developed function get Facebook user information and import into data with 
Facebook API using JavaScript 
 
Developed store view of timesheet of PG/PB using  MySQL procedure 
 
Uploading, displaying and storing data using PHP 
- 
Framework: Zend Framework 1.12 
2010 – 2014: UNIVERSITY TIME 
 Projects: 
1. Automation test program - Program to automatically test software 
 Developed automated testing application 
- 
Language: C# 
- 
Framework: White Framework 
2. Managing forum Toantin.org 
 Managed and remote controlling a VPS 
SKILLS & 
ABILITIES 
COMPUTER: 
 React js – React native 
 Firebase 
 Jquery 
 SASS / LESS 
 Knowledge of E-Commerce 
 HTML5 / CSS3 
 Research 
 PHP/MySQL  
 Node js 
 Boostrap 
 Working with Linux 
 Adobe Photoshop 
SOFT SKILLS: 
 Ability to perform individually as well as in a team  
 Good presentation skill 
 Creative 
 Good problem solving 
 Time management 
 Willingness to learn new knowledge 
EDUCATION 
 2010 - 2014: UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE - HO CHI MINH CITY 
 Bachelor of Mathematical and Computer Science  
 Rank: Good 
2013: DTS COMMUNICATION TECHNOLOGIES CORPORATION 
 Cisco Certified Network Associate (CCNAX V2.0) 
2006 – 2009: CHAU PHU HIGH SCHOOL – AN GIANG 
OBJECTIVE  
1-3 YEARS 
Self-develop, accumulate knowledge, experience and become Technical Leader 
HOBBIES & 
INTERESTS 
Team Sports (football), playing Guitar,  travel
